actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to make direct low-interest loans to veterans eligible for specially adapted housing assistance.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to make direct low-interest loans to veterans eligible for specially adapted housing assistance.

titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to make direct low-interest loans to veterans eligible for specially adapted housing assistance.
